addonSummary.message:
The plugin generates a QR-code from the URL for the open tab.
Can be used to open the current URL on your smartphone.

addonDescription.message: QR-code generator from the URL of the active tab.

optionsErrorCorrectionLevelTooltip.message: The higher the value, the bigger the picture.

optionsQuietZoneTitle.message: Indent from the edge of the pop-up window to the QR-code

optionsRoundedCornersTitle.message: The greater the value, the "rounder" QR-code
